title: Language Education Competency Enhancement Program Using e-Service Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language education theory and practical experience
context.additional_context: A blended research methodology-based curriculum for current elementary language education practitioners, incorporating e-service learning. Project-based assessments are conducted in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Achieve over 80% proficiency in designing e-service learning activities for learner competency enhancement
Improve language education soft skills (collaboration, problem-solving) by 70% through online-offline integrated service learning projects
Meet evaluation criteria for fostering civic consciousness in language education using community-linked service learning cases
Secure the ability to write effectiveness analysis reports on service learning applying mixed research methodologies (surveys, case studies)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
